content: trim so her hair didn t look so wild i gave her square eyes and a sweet smile i like to make my facial features separating 2 strands from the 4 strand yarn i basically make my eyes a square and here she is all finished and ready to attend a red hat society meeting with all her friends page 8 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com
